Episodes.Title: Assume Nothing (1)
Episodes.Plot: One of two couples who meet in a bar is murdered and, when the second couple meets the same fate in a similar fashion, the team suspects a pair of serial killers is on the loose. Catherine gets some troubling news about her father's murder trial.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Violence,sexual themes and content that may disturb
Episodes.GuestStars: Scott Wilson, John Doman, Rudolf Martin, Brian Bloom, Nichole Hiltz, John Kassir, Romy Rosemont, Archie Kao, Moon Bloodgood, Josh Holloway, Scott Alan Smith, David Berman, Terry Bozeman, Michael Azria, Lydia Blanco

Episodes.Title: All for Our Country (2)
Episodes.Plot: When the lead suspects in Grissom's serial killer case are murdered, he suspects an inside job. Catherine and Sara investigate when a college football fan's body is found in a bathtub.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Violence,sexual themes and content that may disturb
Episodes.GuestStars: Sandra Hess, Brandon Kirsch, Nate Torrence, John Doman, David Andrews, Scott Alan Smith, Paul Francis, Marisol Nichols, Lombardo Boyar, Jeffrey Dean Morgan, Blake Shields, Patrice Fisher, Andrew Leeds, Patrick Sto

Episodes.Title: Homebodies
Episodes.Plot: Grissom and Warrick get the case of an elderly woman found mummified in her closet. Sarah and Nick arrive to investigate a 'break and enter' to find a raped teen. Catherine looks into a found gun, now linked to a week-old murder.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Violence,sexual themes and content that may disturb
Episodes.GuestStars: Stephen Root, Jeanette Brox, M. C. Gainey, Paul Francis, Vince Vieluf, Thomas Wilson Brown, Francis Capra, Bill Jacobson, Brandon Kirsch, Keith Pillow, Christine Romeo, Barry Sigismondi, Ross Simanteris, Ron Mele

Episodes.Title: Feeling the Heat
Episodes.Plot: During the latest heat wave, Grissom and Catherine investigate a baby locked in a car. Warrick investigates a man dead of an apparent heat stroke in his house. Nick and Sarah investigate when a woman's body is found floating in a lake.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Violence,sexual themes and content that may disturb
Episodes.GuestStars: Arye Gross, Stacy Edwards, Chris Mulkey, Carlos Jacott, Erik Jensen, Rick Ravanello, Cam Gigandet, Jacy Gross, Paul Rae, Adrienne Smith, Ryan Starr, James Leo Ryan, Chris Mulkey

Episodes.Title: Fur and Loathing
Episodes.Plot: The team investigates when a man's body is found on the side of the road... dressed in a racoon suit. A gunshot victim is found in a freezer.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Violence,sexual themes and content that may disturb
Episodes.GuestStars: Kim Robillard, Edmund Wyson, Kimble Jemison, Traci L. Crouch, Evan Arnold, Steven Barr, Todd Robert Anderson, Paul Francis, Brad Henke, Patrick Fischler, Willie Garson, Chad Einbinder

Episodes.Title: Jackpot
Episodes.Plot: When a severed head is shipped to Dr. Robbins from Jackpot, Nevada, Grissom goes to Jackpot to find the rest of the body but gets very little cooperation from the locals. Catherine gets an unexpected gift from her father.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.
Episodes.GuestStars: Nathan Wetherington, Henry Czerny, Jeffrey Combs, Cameron Dye, Nathan Wetherington, Alyson Reed, Michael Bowen, Brandon Beemer, Bob Bouchard, Lou Gowan, Darcy Halsey, Roger Hewlett, Clem Jeffreys, Jeanette O'Conn

Episodes.Title: Invisible Evidence
Episodes.Plot: Warrick's appearance at the preliminary hearing on a rape and murder case goes terribly wrong when the only piece of evidence is thrown out on a technicality. Grissom and the team have 24 hours to make the case with new evidence or the killer will go free.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.
Episodes.GuestStars: Xander Berkeley, Christian Camargo, Lochlyn Munro, James Marshall, James Patrick Stuart, Erik Jensen, Autumn Reeser, Larry Sullivan, Andrea Roth, Kayren Butler, Michael Ensign, Gary Anthony Williams

Episodes.Title: After the Show
Episodes.Plot: A suspect's infatuation with Catherine results in her taking over the high-profile case of a missing woman who aspired to be a showgirl.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.
Episodes.GuestStars: Xander Berkeley, Martin Donovan, Jaime Ray Newman, Paul Cassell, Gildart Jackson, Branen Morgan, Sean Christopher Davis, Bradley James, Maureen Muldoon, Tom Warden, Edmund Wyson

Episodes.Title: Grissom Versus the Volcano
Episodes.Plot: The sheriff is under political pressure to find the killer of an air marshall with a car bomb, Warrick and Sarah investigate the murder of the wife of a headline singer on The Strip.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.
Episodes.GuestStars: Tricia O'Kelley, Randy J. Goodwin, Louis Lombardi, Daphne Duplaix, Vincent Corazza, Marc Valera, Benny Nieves, Tom Gallop, Xander Berkeley, Billy Keane, Don Stark, Susan Diol, Benjamin Bryan, Benny Nieves

Episodes.Title: Coming of Rage
Episodes.Plot: Grissom, Sarah, and Warrick investigate the murder of a teenager found on a construction site. Nick and Catherine try to discover how a woman on her lawn was killed by a gunshot  when no-one nearby had a gun.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Violence and horror scenes. Content may disturb

Episodes.Title: Eleven Angry Jurors
Episodes.Plot: The lone holdout member of a jury is found dead in the jury room. Nick reopens a four-year-old case when the sister of the victim comes forward with new evidence.
Episodes.GuestStars: Ever Carradine, Eddie Jemison, Billy Wirth, Dean Norris, Jack Laufer, Susan May Pratt, Andy Berman, Chelsea Bond, Andy Powers, Sarah Rafferty, Sarah Buxton, Anne Betancourt, Darryl Alan Reed

Episodes.Title: Butterflied
Episodes.Plot: When a woman resembling Sara is found murdered in her home, Grissom takes a personal interest in the case, forcing him to examine the decisions he has made in his life.
Episodes.GuestStars: Kyle Secor, Josh Stamberg, James Patrick Stuart, Tinsley Grimes, Rich Hutchman, Jeff Sugarman, Kyle Secor

Episodes.Title: Suckers
Episodes.Plot: Grissom, Sara, and Nick respond to an electrocution at a casino. Catherine and Warrick investigate a vampire murder.

Episodes.Title: Paper or Plastic

Episodes.Title: Early Rollout
Episodes.Plot: The entire team investigates the execution murders of a porn star and her husband. Things get personal for Catherine when Grissom talks to her about her evaluation.

Episodes.Title: Getting Off
Episodes.Plot: Catherine and Sara deal with the death of someone who appears at first to be transvestite.  Grissom, Nick and Warrick investigate the death of a man in a homeless area.

Episodes.Title: XX

Episodes.Title: Bad to the Bone
Episodes.Plot: The investigation of a violent murder in a casino parking garage leads to a missing woman, a long-dead body and a missing child.

Episodes.Title: Bad Words
Episodes.Plot: Warrick, Catherine and Nick try to determine the cause of a house fire that kills a teenage kill. Grissom and Sara investigate when a competitor in a word game tournament is found dead with letter tiles in his stomach.

Episodes.Title: Dead Ringer

Episodes.Title: Turn of the Screws

Episodes.Title: No More Bets

Episodes.Title: Bloodlines
Episodes.Plot: A casino employee is beaten and raped on her way home from work, but she survives and identifies her attacker. When a DNA test sets him free, Grissom wrestles with his belief that  evidence can ever lie.
